CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is due to the fact that it directly uses user input in 'innerHTML' which can lead to the execution of malicious scripts. Additionally, the function does not properly validate or sanitize the input 'html' before using it, which can lead to various types of attacks.
